headline.main: Cubans Welcome Historic Castro-Obama Meeting, Want Results
headline.print_headline: Cubans Welcome Historic Castro-Obama Meeting, Want Results

docs.snippet: Cubans hailed Saturday's historic meeting between presidents Raul Castro and Barack Obama but said they want to see ties warm faster between the Cold War foes so that the lives of ordinary people on the island can improve....
docs.lead_paragraph: Cubans hailed Saturday's historic meeting between presidents Raul Castro and Barack Obama but said they want to see ties warm faster between the Cold War foes so that the lives of ordinary people on the island can improve.

headline.main: Animals in the news around the globe
headline.sub: Animals in the news around the globe

docs.snippet: From a canine shopkeeper in Japan to a budding friendship between a tortoise and a dog in Texas, here's a look at the week's top animal stories. Vanessa Johnston reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: From a canine shopkeeper in Japan to a budding friendship between a tortoise and a dog in Texas, here's a look at the week's top animal stories. Vanessa Johnston reports.

headline.main: McIlroy Starts Fast, but Stumbles Home in Masters Finish
headline.print_headline: McIlroy Starts Fast, but Stumbles Home in Masters Finish

docs.snippet: Rory McIlroy roared off the starting line and almost as suddenly ran out of gas....
docs.lead_paragraph: Rory McIlroy roared off the starting line and almost as suddenly ran out of gas.

headline.main: Greenpeace Group Leaves Arctic Drill Rig After Six-Day Stay
headline.print_headline: Greenpeace Group Leaves Arctic Drill Rig After Six-Day Stay

docs.snippet: Six Greenpeace activists opposed to offshore drilling in the Arctic have abandoned a Seattle-bound drill rig they boarded in the Pacific Ocean six days ago, the organization said Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Six Greenpeace activists opposed to offshore drilling in the Arctic have abandoned a Seattle-bound drill rig they boarded in the Pacific Ocean six days ago, the organization said Saturday.

headline.main: Fist Pumps and Roars as Woods Turns Back Clock
headline.print_headline: Fist Pumps and Roars as Woods Turns Back Clock

docs.snippet: The ferocious fist pump was back and the roars echoed around Augusta National once again for Tiger Woods, who turned back the clock during his first nine in the third round of the Masters on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The ferocious fist pump was back and the roars echoed around Augusta National once again for Tiger Woods, who turned back the clock during his first nine in the third round of the Masters on Saturday.

headline.main: Bubba's Title Defense Ends With an Adventurous 73
headline.print_headline: Bubba's Title Defense Ends With an Adventurous 73

docs.snippet: Bubba Watson's title defense at the Masters effectively ended with a roller-coaster third round on Saturday that began with a damaging triple-bogey on the opening hole....
docs.lead_paragraph: Bubba Watson's title defense at the Masters effectively ended with a roller-coaster third round on Saturday that began with a damaging triple-bogey on the opening hole.

headline.main: Hawaii Governor Says Telescope-Construction Timeout Extended
headline.print_headline: Hawaii Governor Says Telescope-Construction Timeout Extended

docs.snippet: Hawaii Gov. David Ige said Saturday that a nonprofit company planning to build one of the world's largest telescopes atop a mountain many Native Hawaiians consider sacred will maintain a moratorium on construction for another week....
docs.lead_paragraph: Hawaii Gov. David Ige said Saturday that a nonprofit company planning to build one of the world's largest telescopes atop a mountain many Native Hawaiians consider sacred will maintain a moratorium on construction for another week.

docs.snippet: President Obama spoke at the Summit of the Americas about the improved relationship between the United States and Cuba....
docs.lead_paragraph: President Obama spoke at the Summit of the Americas about the improved relationship between the United States and Cuba.

headline.main: McIlroy's Career Grand Slam Hopes Gone After Late Bogeys
headline.print_headline: McIlroy's Career Grand Slam Hopes Gone After Late Bogeys

docs.snippet: Rory McIlroy did not get the Saturday miracle he needed to give himself a chance of winning the Masters and completing a career Grand Slam....
docs.lead_paragraph: Rory McIlroy did not get the Saturday miracle he needed to give himself a chance of winning the Masters and completing a career Grand Slam.

headline.main: Garissa victim was family's first to go to university
headline.sub: Garissa victim was family's first to go to university

docs.snippet: Godfrey Gitau reflects on the loss of his daughter, Bilha Njoki, who was killed at Garissa University in Kenya. Display (no reporter narration). Produced by Nathan Frandino and Robert Waweru....
docs.lead_paragraph: Godfrey Gitau reflects on the loss of his daughter, Bilha Njoki, who was killed at Garissa University in Kenya. Display (no reporter narration). Produced by Nathan Frandino and Robert Waweru.
